name: Rhythm Buddies (Very unfinished but i decided to post it anyway because i thought people might enjoy the funky music)
name_original: Rhythm Buddies (Very unfinished but i decided to post it anyway because i thought people might enjoy the funky music)
description:
A very very unfinished version of a rhythm-based platformer made for Wowie Jam 4, it's not really a game since there is no objective, but at least it has some funky music.

You play as bird called flap, and have a robot companion called Wobble, and it was planned that you would have to collaborate with wobble to complete levels, being boosted by jumping on their head, or flying them to new locations, but i very much ran out of time, so now you just both dance on a floating platform - still pretty good I would say.

Controls:
(Buttons have to be pressed on the beat of the music!)
Left/Right Arrow Key - Move
Space - Jump
Esc - Quit to menu

Known issues:
 - Volume slider doesn't work
 - You can do 2 actions on 1 beat if timed right
 - You can go through walls if moving diagonally down into them
 - The game just ends when the music ends, even though the music loops
 - Beat latency can be bad sometimes
 - There uh.. isn't really an objective of any kind
